name: Moshiur Rahman
about: Highly experienced on technical field, process development & management. Excellent capability to face any challenge with innovative ideas to achieve the goal. Experienced on every detail thing of garments cutting section.

name: Nur-A-Alom Milton
about: Excellent knowledge on machine, technical field, buyer demand & management. Highly experienced to manage any difficulties to maintain proper work flow. Excellent capability to maintain proper communication with suppliers & technical team

name: Shohidul Kobir
about: Excellent knowledge on technical field, product quality, buyer demand & management. Highly experienced to ensure process development & innovate new ideas to develop quality standard with productivity. Likes to share experience & new ideas to subordinate to develop their skill.
